pattern_discovered.name: Database Migration Concurrent Execution Protection
pattern_discovered.description: Critical gap in dev launcher database migration idempotency and recovery state validation. Affects all three microservices through shared #removed-legacycausing cascade failures.

technical_manifestation.vulnerability: Complete data loss possible in worst case scenarios

primary_cause.explanation: Dev launcher assumed single-user, sequential execution model

contributing_factors.factor: Service boundary confusion in test placement
Cross-service shared database URL creating implicit coupling
Insufficient concurrency testing in CI/CD pipeline
Migration rollback scenarios not systematically tested
Lock mechanism validation gaps in concurrent scenarios

architectural_debt.issue: Multiple duplicate lock manager implementations violating SSOT
Cross-service import dependencies creating tight coupling
Global state management without proper isolation
Legacy code patterns in critical path components

challenge.details: Test incorrectly placed in netra_backend instead of dev_launcher directory
challenge.impact: Blocks CI/CD integration, creates maintenance burden

challenge.details: Duplicate concurrent protection logic across services
challenge.impact: Maintenance burden, consistency risks, technical debt

challenge.details: Need actual threading/multiprocessing, not mocked concurrency
challenge.impact: Higher test complexity, longer execution times
challenge.resolution_pattern: Real integration tests over unit tests for concurrency

challenge.impact: Migration failures cascade across all services

step_1.name: Define Discrepancy
step_1.description: Exact scenario where concurrent migrations cause data corruption

step_3.name: Surgical Implementation
step_3.description: Minimal changes to achieve concurrent protection
step_3.boundaries: dev_launcher service only, no cross-service modifications

service_boundaries.requirement: Tests must reside in service-specific directories
No cross-service imports in test implementations

environment_coordination.requirement: Database state isolation between test runs
Cleanup protocols for concurrent test execution

ci_cd_pipeline.requirement: Performance thresholds for test execution time
